nodes.text:
​
 
Date: 04/04/2025                                                                                        ​
 
NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT 
This Agreement is made between the undersigned intern (hereinafter referred to as the 
“Intern”) and Suvidha Foundation (hereinafter referred to as the “Organization”). 
1. Confidentiality Obligation 
The Intern agrees to maintain strict confidentiality of all information, materials, and work 
(including but not limited to data, documents, strategies, research, and internal 
communications) received, developed, or accessed during the internship with Suvidha 
Foundation. 
The Intern shall not disclose any such information or share any work, directly or indirectly, 
with any individual, institution, or organization other than Suvidha Foundation, without prior 
written consent from the Organization. 
2. Ownership of Work 
All work completed by the Intern during the internship period — including but not limited to 
projects, intellectual property, inventions, publications, presentations, code, designs, 
reports, and any other deliverables — shall be the exclusive property of Suvidha Foundation. 
The Intern acknowledges and agrees that: 
●​ Suvidha Foundation shall hold full and sole ownership, including all Intellectual 
Property Rights (IPR), over such work.​
 
●​ The Intern shall not claim authorship, copyright, or any other rights over the work, 
unless explicitly agreed upon in writing by the Organization. 
3. Breach of Agreement 
If an Intern drops out of the internship or discontinues midway and proceeds to continue 
working on the same project independently or with any other entity, it shall be considered a 
breach of confidentiality and ownership. 
 

 
 
 
 
Such actions will be liable for legal action under applicable laws including the Intellectual 
Property Rights (IPR) Act and other relevant statutory provisions. 
4. Term and Survival 
This Agreement shall remain in effect during the course of the internship and shall survive 
indefinitely beyond the internship period, with respect to all proprietary and confidential 
information and ownership clauses. 
5. Governing Law 
This Agreement shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any 
disputes arising under or in connection with this Agreement shall be subject to the 
jurisdiction of the courts located in India. 
 
Name of Intern: ____________________________________    
 
Signature: ____________________________     Date: ____________________________​
 
​
 
Mrs. Shobha Motghare ​
Secretary, Suvidha Foundation
